Name: La Cacerola
Review Text: Amazing service and great food. Small and cozy place worth reserving for peak times. Some stair climbing is required.

Name: La Cacerola
Review Text: Wonderful dining experience! The service was excellent and accommodating, the food delicious, and the atmosphere fantastic. Highly recommended. We had the chef's choice 4-course menu, and I can recommend it.

Name: La Cacerola
Review Text: Don't expect a quick dinner. Take your time and enjoy the friendly service and a surprise menu. Great quality food inspired by different cuisines. Gezellig location. Well worth a try!

Name: La Cacerola
Review Text: Main points:  Atmosphere is awesome, intimate and cozy.  The server/host guy was amazing and the service was fantastic (maybe the best in Amsterdam).  Oh, and the food was surprising and spectacular.

Name: La Cacerola
Review Text:

Name: La Cacerola
Review Text: What a gem! Very tasty, good prices and lovely personnel. Small place with just a few tables which makes for an intimate atmosphere.

Name: La Cacerola
Review Text: Goo quality food, but we expended more than 2h to have dinner, too much time waiting for the next service, kitchen is really slow. Quantity very small. I considered going to McDonalds after dinner.

Name: La Cacerola
Review Text: Very good food + small and cosy place + good service. Recommend to go with surprise menu: no big surprises, just delicious!

Name: La Cacerola
Review Text: Place was a waste of time. We  had reservations that they messed up. They made us change tables mid way through our dinner because they messed up reservations. Then we were told we were told we were told we were too loud. Don't eat here.

Name: La Cacerola
Review Text: Fantastic food and wine. Very pleasant vibe of an old Amsterdam NL building. Now on my list of places to recommend.

Name: La Cacerola
Review Text: Great atmosphere! Amazing food, and friendly service! I can only recommend.

Name: La Cacerola
Review Text: I have just moved in around the corner. How lucky am I. Great food, great staff. I will be back often

Name: La Cacerola
